channel.title: Pharmaceutical Industry on FinanClub
channel.description: Recent content in Pharmaceutical Industry on FinanClub

item.title: MRK
item.description: score:1154 Chances: Merck reported stronger-than-expected Q2 earnings and raised its 2023 guidance. Keytruda cancer-drug sales drove better-than-expected Q2 revenue and a raised full-year sales forecast. Merck’s top-selling products, Keytruda and HPV vaccine Gardasil, experienced strong demand. Cleveland Clinic has started enrolling subjects in a treatment arm evaluating Anixa’s breast cancer vaccine with Keytruda.

item.title: BMY
item.description: score:972 Chances: Bristol Myers Squibb has a history of consistently paying dividends for the last 90 years. Pharmaceutical company AbbVie reports better-than-expected Q2 sales for its arthritis medication Humira. Discounted blue-chip stocks with potential upside may offer investment opportunities in a market with some lagging stocks.
